## Icon Sizing

```
w-4 h-4 (16px):  ğŸ”  Small icons
w-5 h-5 (20px):  ğŸ”  Medium icons
w-6 h-6 (24px):  ğŸ”  Standard (DEFAULT)
w-8 h-8 (32px):  ğŸ”  Large icons
```

**Note:** Use Lucide React icons, not emojis in actual UI

## Contrast Ratios

### Text on White Background

```
foreground (#1f2937):       7.0:1  âœ“ WCAG AAA
muted-foreground (#6b7280): 4.6:1  âœ“ WCAG AA
border (#e5e7eb):           1.2:1  âœ— Not for text
```

### Interactive Elements

```
Primary button (#2563eb):   6.3:1  âœ“ Excellent
Link text (primary):        6.3:1  âœ“ Excellent
Disabled text:              3.2:1  âœ“ Minimum for large text
```
